title: Shaanxi
summary: Shaanxi (/ʃɑːnˈʃiː/;[5] simplified Chinese: 陕西; traditional Chinese: 陝西, Mandarin pronunciation: [ʂàn.ɕí] (listen); alternately Shensi) is a landlocked province of the People's Republic of China. Officially part of Northwest China, it borders the province-level divisions of Shanxi (NE, E), Henan (E), Hubei (SE), Chongqing (S), Sichuan (SW), Gansu (W), Ningxia (NW) and Inner Mongolia (N).
